Articles.Content: Sometimes when I'm making a large rocket the lag of my slow laptop is agonising. My concept is that each part can be grouped into one large part so the game only needs to "calculate" the physics on that one part. This is also useful for dealing with large payloads.

Try Ubiowelding.  It "welds" parts together, doing exactly what you wants.

Not all parts can be welded together (docking ports sometimes has glitches when welded), but it helps a lot with the parts that can.
